title: Integrated Competency-Based Financial Statement Analysis Simulation Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational financial accounting theory, Excel proficiency, and understanding of financial statement structures
context.additional_context: Project-based environment requiring data analysis and collaboration using real corporate financial statements.

learning_goals: Learners can calculate and interpret over 10 financial ratios from actual corporate financial statements and apply them to decision-making.
Learners can collaboratively write a logically structured research report analyzing results with team members in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can demonstrate expert-level financial analysis competencies by submitting revised reports incorporating feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
